title: september 20: the battle of the sexes
description:
In today’s episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia shares the inspirational story of tennis legend Billie Jean King and her most famous match, Battle of the Sexes. This defining moment all happened on this day in history, and most importantly has reminded us to never undermine a woman’s strength. Speaking of defining moments, Maia also shares a defining moment in The Beatles life that has forever shaped history. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
